title: Maasi Maasam Lyrics Dharma Durai(1991)
stanzas:
Maasi maasam aalaana
onnu maaman
enakkuthaane
naalai ennai naan
kaathirundhen
maaman unakkuthaane

oh.
Maasi maasam aalaana
onnu maaman
enakkuthaane
naalai ennai naan
kaathirundhen
maaman unakkuthaane

aasai nooraachu ponga
nilavu vandhaachu vaanga
nerunga nerunga
porunga porunga

aasai naan kondu vandhaal
alli thaen kolla vandhaal
mayangi kiranga
kirangi uranga
oh ho oh..

Maasi maasam aalaana
onnu maaman
enakkuthaane
naalai ennai naan
kaathirundhen
maaman unakkuthaane

kaama leela vinodham
kadhal kavitha
vilaasam
padithu padhithu
edukka edukka
oh ho oh..

aasai aahaa pramaadham
moga kavidha pravaagam
thoduthu thoduthu
mudikka mudikka
